name: First Perspective Scene
description:
First Perspective scene made inside Unity.

This is for educational purposes only!

I did not create the assets, I downloaded them from the asset store you can find all assets used here:

Rock and Boulders 2:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/exterior/rock-and-boulders-2-6947#description

Dream Forest Tree:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vegetation/trees/dream-forest-tree-105297#description

Wire Fence:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/wire-fence-67846#description

City Street Skyboxes Vol1. :

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/city-street-skyboxes-vol-1-157401

Grass Flowers Pack:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/grass-flowers-pack-free-138810#content

PBR Ground Free:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/floors/pbr-ground-free-158595

Terrain Textures Pack:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/terrain-textures-pack-free-139542

Audio, Enviroment sounds by MrFossy:

https://freesound.org/people/MrFossy/sounds/502764/
